// src/components/Layout.jsx import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShoppingCart, User, Menu, Home, X } from 'lucide-react' import api from '../api/axios' // your axios instance import useAuth from '../hooks/useAuth' // your hook returning [user, setUser] export default function Layout({ children }) { const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false) const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]) const [user, setUser] = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() // Fetch categories once useEffect(() => { api .get('/categories') // adjust to your real endpoint .then(res => setCategories(res.data)) .catch(console.error) }, []) const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token') setUser(null) setDrawerOpen(false) navigate('/') } return (
{/* ===== TOP BAR ===== */}
{/* left: hamburger + home */}
{/* center: search bar */}
{/* right: user & cart */}
{/* ===== DRAWER / SIDEBAR ===== */} {drawerOpen && (
{/* header */}
{user ? `Hello, ${user.username}` : 'Hello, User'}
{/* auth actions */}
{user ? ( <> setDrawerOpen(false)} > Settings ) : ( setDrawerOpen(false)} > Sign In )}
{/* category list */}

Categories

    {categories.map((c) => (
  • setDrawerOpen(false)} > {c.category}
    • ))}
{/* overlay to click close */}
setDrawerOpen(false)} />
)} {/* ===== PAGE CONTENT ===== */}
{children}
{/* ===== FOOTER ===== */}
Â© {new Date().getFullYear()} Bookstore. All rights reserved.
) }
